tool_description: Enhance your soccer experience with accurate, data-driven match predictions for betting, fantasy leagues, and fan engagement, available daily for leagues worldwide.
name: The Predictors
title: The Predictors

api_list.name: safe
api_list.description: Safe predictions for the next day (available from 13:30 UTC)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-predictors.p.rapidapi.com/predictor/safe"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-predictors.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
